entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as someone who was never a prefect herself. ("I was never a prefect myself," said Tonks brightly from behind Harry...)

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who is talking to Tonks and laughing at her joke. ("Like what?" said Ginny, who was choosing a baked potato.)

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who is right beside Harry and letting out his usual barklike laugh. ("What about you, Sirius?" Ginny asked... "No one would have made me a prefect, I spent too much time in detention with James.")

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as someone who was in detention with Sirius. ("No one would have made me a prefect, I spent too much time in detention with James.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the good boy who got the badge. ("Lupin was the good boy, he got the badge.")
